entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
